job.title: Software Test Engineer- C#, Black Box Testing, VB
job.description: If you are a Software Test Engineer with experience, please read on! In this role you will have a mix of test (2/3) and development (1/3) in C#, .net, and VB for automated machinery.  What You Will Be Doing  Develops level designs and algorithms. Does complete analysis, coding and test of routines. Performs system integration of different software components for automated machinery.  What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Software Test Engineer with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Stephen.Maroda@CyberCoders.com Stephen Maroda - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
